channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2024070312
item.description:
Report X-2024070312

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-08T18:15:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-03
  • City: AVENEL
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Forklift driver was turning with the pallet in the air when a corner on the pallet broke causing the five-gallon pail to fall off the pallet resulting in a spill.

item.title: Report X-2024070097
item.description:
Report X-2024070097

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-28
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was noted that the spill was caused by a small puncture at the top right. and also, at the cap of the plastic Jerrican. Approximately 0.25 lg was leaked from the 5-gallon Jerrican. After inspection, it was placed in a lined salvage drum for disposition instruction.

item.title: Report X-2024070109
item.description:
Report X-2024070109

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-28
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PKG WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEKAGE. UPON INSPECTION TWO BOTTLES OF ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER WAS FOUND TO BE 1/2 WAY LEAKED OUT CAUSE FROM THE CAPS BEING LOOSE. THE CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE.

item.title: Report X-2024070174
item.description:
Report X-2024070174

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-26
  • City: SECAUCUS
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO AREA; HAZMAT FOUND ON FLOOR WITHOUT ANY STAINS OF BEING WET. UPON FURTHUR INVESTIGATION AND FOLLOWING PROTOCAL, RESPONDER FOUND THAT THE BOX LEAKED. RESPONDER CONTANERIZED BOX AND TOOK TO HAZMAT DMP AREA FOR FURTHUR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024070259
item.description:
Report X-2024070259

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-20
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A fiberboard box was found with signs of release at the EWRH facility during sort operations. The fiberboard box contained twenty glass bottles packaged inside of plastic sealed bags with egg crates top and bottom. One of the bottles broke spilling the contents inside of the fiberboard box. All contents were placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING SIGNS OF LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION ONE BOTTLE OF NU BRITE WAS FOUND TO BE 1/4 LEAKING FROM A LOOSE CAP. THE CAP TIGHTEN AND ALL CONTENTS WERE PLSCED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETRUNED TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE.

item.title: Report X-2024061706
item.description:
Report X-2024061706

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T15:13:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-27
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVER SORT THE PACKSGE WAS BROUGH THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION ONE OF FOUR BOTTLES OF 95% REAGENT ALCOHOL WAS FOUND WITH THE CAP MISSING AND FULLY LEAKED OUT. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE.

item.title: Report X-2024061817
item.description:
Report X-2024061817

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-02T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-28
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024061817 DURING THE OVERIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF LEAKAGE CAUSE FROM A HOLE IN TOP IN THE CORNER COULD CAUSE FROM IT BEING DROOP. THE ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER JERRICAN WAS PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE. 2. X-2024070001 DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PKG WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEKAGE. UPON INSPECTION TWO BOTTLES OF ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER WAS FOUND TO BE 1/2 WAY LEAKED OUT CAUSE FROM THE CAPS BEING LOOSE. THE CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE. 3. X-2024070029 DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PKG WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEKAGE. UPON INSPECTION TWO BOTTLES OF ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER WAS FOUND TO BE 1/2 WAY LEAKED OUT CAUSE FROM THE CAPS BEING LOOSE. THE CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE.
